archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Access the ESA-Dev repository and choose "Use this template"
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
In GitHub, the "Use this template" feature allows users to create a new repository with the same directory structure and files as an existing template repository. This is particularly useful for standardizing project structures, ensuring consistency in documentation, license files, and initial codebase across multiple projects.
